title: Design, synthesis and in silico molecular docking evaluation of novel 1,2,3-triazole derivatives as potent antimicrobial agents
content:
Publication date: 15 April 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 7

Author(s): Sudhakar Reddy Baddam, Mahesh Kumar Avula, Raghunadh Akula, Venkateswara Rao Battula, Sudhakar Kalagara, Ravinder Buchikonda, Srinivas Ganta, Srinivasadesikan Venkatesan, Tejeswara Rao Allaka
